description:
For over 27 years, Java has remained one of the most highly used technologies on the planet. This is because Java is not just a useful programming language and platform, but because it has a robust and diversee community that connects us all. As we look at the next quarter century for Java, it's critical that the Java community stays engaged. In this talk, learn about the multiple programs and activities that developers can join and/or participate in to move Java forward, together, ensuring it represents the unique backgrounds, skills and creativity of the community.


Truly, "The Future of Java is...Community."
title: The Future of Java is...Community
